name: Match 3 Revolution
description: "Match 3 Revolution” is an original physics match3/marble game with 100 game levels. Create sets of at least 3 touching balls of the same color. Original game modes, supercharge with combos, a lot of power-ups (electroball, fireball, megabomb, fusionball, missiles,…) and a Top 50 Online World Ranking in every level.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Pentium IV Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 7 compatible graphics card with 1 GB memory DirectX: Version 7.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 180 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bits
